section.title: p:filter
section.para: The p:filter step evaluates an XPath expression against the input document.
This step evaluates the select expression against the input document. The result of that evaluation appears on the result port.
This step is very similar to a p:with-input with a select expression except that the select expression is computed dynamically (because itâ€™s a step option in this case).

simplesect.title: Document properties
simplesect.para: No document properties are preserved. When portions of the input are selected, the base-uri property of each document constructed from a selected portion will reflect the base URI of the selected node(s).
